issue.title: [CF 1580] Pasting TMW profile string freezes game
issue.body:
Hi. Lately, every time I try to paste the tmw profile string for a class into the game it freezes my game for a couple mins but then unfreezes. But now it's disconnecting me from WoW. Is there any way to fix this?


> Posted by CurseForge user khboyer1128 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1580 | Raw

comments.body:
No, unfortunately not. TMW plays no part in the pasting of text into the textbox - this is handled entirely by Blizzard. They made some change that made this problem quite bad in BfA, but there's nothing I can do about it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I see. Well, thanks for the response.


> Posted by CurseForge user khboyer1128
